name: David Lee
text: Thin crust! Fast and fresh ingredients! Definitely will come back again!

name: Jasmin Hussain
text: Nice location. The pizza dough is very thin and crispy. I like it this way. But you can opt for a thicker crusty. Unlimited toppings. Difficult not to indulge. Service is quick and friendly. Restrooms are clean.

name: Adrian Hernandez
text: Great place to eat. Its a subway for pizza haha! Came here for the first time and was blown away by how friendly everyone was, especially the guy with the red hair! ‚Ä¶More

name: Ya-Chu Chang
text: Fast service and good pizza. Yummy ~

name: Angel Zapata
text: I tried the Tristan pizza and a deluxe salad. The honey lime dressing is delicious. The pizza waa thin crust and crunchy. Best if eaten right away so that the cheese doesn't get cold. Definitely coming back, it's a bit pricey, but still worth it.

name: Amy W K Tan
text: The pizzas are fresh and made on the spot hot and tasty. The draft beer is $2 each cup on Tuesday.

name: Ali Abdel Halim ÿπŸÑŸä ÿπÿ®ÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸÑŸäŸÖ HATOUM
text: Friendly helpful staff, very good crust, cheese and fresh toppings, plenty of vegan options as well

name: Kevin Duffin
text: The attention to detail was top notch. I had an idea of what I wanted(see photos in the scrollable gallery), and Mike(I think it was Mike) helped me embellish what I already had in mind, and his recommendations complimented the flavor ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Fess
text: Not bad but i prefer pizza rev on colima. 35 toppings to choose from and sauces

name: Alan Palacios
text: It's pretty good, the dough could be thicker, it's more like a cracker than a regular pizza, but the rest of the ingredients are good. The beer was nice, and the price was pretty reasonable. Would go again.

name: Rachael Torres
text: If you're looking for an easy place to grab a pizza for yourself or a big group, this is a great place to come. The staff is incredibly friendly and the atmosphere is very nice and clean. I will definitely come back here again.

name: Jason Erl
text: Super cool place! Delicious, cheap, and getting to customize your pizza and watching it get made is very neat

name: Josaf Sandoval
text: I think the pizza is here are way too small and overpriced. If you try the lemonade I recommend you water it down. I think they used the same lemonade for the past two days and it starts to taste very very acidic. The taste of the pizza though is quite delicious.

name: ND MRTZ
text: The pizza was great. The thin bread was crunchy and had great flavor. The vegetables were fresh and well cooked. I had an 11" pizza with mushrooms, artichokes and it was Devine.

name: jenn 13
text: I went to mod pizza because i was craving pizza and it is right next to where i worked . let me tell you the staff was amazing and super friendly . i guess i looked like a deer in headlights because he asked if it was my first time there ‚Ä¶More

name: Reuben Molina
text: Great place to eat. Try to eat here as often as I can. Great people great attitude and great service. üëç

name: Tony Hsieh
text: Nice staff, fast service and good pizza. Kids love it, I love it and it's next to some of our frequent stops.

name: Nancy De Loera
text: The staff here is so friendly and inviting. Also the toppings variety is pretty different to other build your own pizza places

name: Cindy
text: It's our first time dinning there today.  My boys love the pizza and I was amazed with their service!  Very courteous and explained everything clearly.

name: jerry mejia
text: Good to take the bratz for a slice.

name: Chico Jaurequi
text: Went to the Puente Hills MOD Pizza place for the first time today on 3/7/17. Best individual personal pizza I've ever had. Great employees and even better, great fresh tasting pizza. The ingredients my server suggested with my order set the ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Barela
text: Love this place. I come here twice a week. No pictures if the pizza because I inhale it every time I get one in front of me.

name: Marc Cerilli
text: Great service.  Some of the best pizza I have ever had.

name: Natalie Estrada
text: The pizza was okay.  Where the toppings were at,  was dirty.  The whole place was dirty.  They made our salad with old lettuce.  Our salad was a simple caesar salad,  and they forgot the croutons.  The pizza was too expensive.  I'm sticking with Blazin Pizza.

name: Kay Cat
text: The place is new and clean. The pizza is great. This is the first time i have been to a make your own pizza place and i have to say that the staff here were great and accommodating, especially Edward. I will definitly be going back when i am in the area again.

name: George Ramirez
text: They accidentally switched out order but they were quick to fix it ! Staff very friendly

name: Maria Salazar
text: Very good pizza  , I have tried many pizza places like this one but this one is by far the best tasting pizza crust I've had

name: Jose Valencia
text: Great tasteing pizza with lots of topping choices. Cooks very quickly, prefect for lunch time. Staff is really helpful and friendly too.

name: VINOD Khurana
text: I was afraid of trying a new pizza that I'm glad I did and let me tell you it's awesome great flavor, loved it

name: Michael Park
text: Consistently good quality ingredients. If you dont want the underside of the pizza burnt (most of the time it will), request as so to the prepper. Great customer service.

name: Daniel Chiang
text: Pizzas cooked quickly and thoroughly, tasted pretty good. 5/5 for what it is. It's a little saltier than I'd prefer (I got the calexico), but I would eat here again. ‚Ä¶More

name: KILLA CALI
text: Best pizza for topping selections and fast and great service.

name: Robert Castillo
text: Love that you can load up on the toppings and the price is still the same. The pizza gets cooked well and fairly quick.

name: Mark Harder
text: FAST, friendly staff, and the best of the fixed price pizzas.  Get the double crust.

name: Tony Lee
text: With unlimited toppings and under $10, these are some of the best pizzas you'll ever have.. nom nom nom

text: Awesome food good price great people.
